com.navis.framework.portal.context.server

Class DefaultServerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.portal.context.server.DefaultServerContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IServerContext

    public class DefaultServerContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServerContext
    Handles the lifecycle of the server application. Initial code brought over from DefaultServletContextListener. This initial version does not yet have a full listener implementation
    Author:
    Heji Kim, Jul 1, 2008
